title: Can You Survive The Zombie Apocalypse - Max Brallier
description:
Can You Survive the Zombie Apocalypse? 
by Max Brallier  

Inside these pages lies unspeakable horror. Bloodsplattering, brain-impaling, flesh-devouring horror. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve probably read your fair share of zombie stories. But this time itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s different. No longer can you sit idle as a bunch of fools make all the wrong moves. All hell is about to break looseÃ¢â‚¬â€and YOU have a say in humanityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s survival. 

You have choices to make. 

Moral dilemmas. 

Strategic decisions. 

Weapons. Vehicles. 

Will you be a hero? 

Or will you cover your own ass at all costs? 

Can you withstand the coming hours, days, weeks, and months? Or will you die amidst the chaos and violence of a zombie uprising? 

Or, worst of all, will you become one of them?
